---
title: "Visualize your data with ggplot"
---


After you have finished your downstream analyses (which we will not get into in this course), you will want to visualize your results. 

[R](https://www.r-project.org/) has a powefull package, called [ggplot](https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org/) that is very versatile. We work with it a lot, so we will present it to you today. 

::: {.callout-tip}
Click the three horizontal bars in the lower left corner of the presentation, then `Tools`, then `Fullscreen` to see the presentation in full screen mode. Press escape to leave the full screen mode. 
:::
